info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 15 at 1:43PM CDT until May 15 at 2:15PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN MADISON COUNTY... At 142 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 2 miles west of Japton to 2 miles southeast of Witter, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... St. Paul... Saint Paul... Pettigrew... Japton... Witter... Aurora... Boston... Georgetown... Dutton... Red Star... Weathers... Brashears... Crosses... Combs... Patrick... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
